title: SAT100 Unit 1 Current Non Sustainable Agriculture Practices

subtasks: Listen to instructor discussing various non-sustainable agricultural practices
Examine historical tillage methods vs. modern no-till practices
Analyze current use of synthetic fertilizers and their environmental impacts
Understand limitations of synthetic pesticides/herbicides and genetic modifications
Evaluate effects of corporate farming and large-scale feeding operations
Recognize challenges of sustainable agriculture and population growth on resources
Consider impacts of monoculture crops and chemical runoff on ecosystems
Reflect on the necessity of changing unsustainable farming methods
